## basicQC

Adapted from FastQC: 
Andrews S. (2010). FastQC: a quality control tool for high throughput sequence data. Available online at: http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc

```{r include=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(fig.pos = 'H')

library(MotifBinner2)

if (!exists('result'))
{
  result <- all_results[['basicQC']]
}
if (class(result) != 'basicQC')
{
  result <- all_results[['basicQC']]
}
```

The following datasets must be Quality Checked:
`r names(result$kept)`

```{r, include=FALSE}
out <- NULL

for (data_set_name in names(result$kept))
{
  out <- c(out, knit_child('basicQC_internal.Rmd'))
}
```

```{r, results='asis'}
cat(paste(out, collapse = '\n'))
```

```{r, results='asis'}
kable_summary(result$summary)

timingTable(result)
```
